description.value:
You gain one of the following powers of your choice. This new power replaces the daily attack power you gained at 5th level.

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.nJPHSpdM2lcmbkIg]{Gaze of the Sun}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.3VEIYz7FurQjkSLx]{Unconquerable Spirit}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.Pz4aRUvDou2m3Txg]{Wrathful Judgment}
